Neil Burch
Darse Billings
Chris Rayner
dcterms:description: Leduc poker is a highly simplified research poker variant with 6 cards, two suits, and three ranks (King, Queen, Jack). Each player has a one card hand and there is one community card. The game includes two betting rounds, one before and after the community card is revealed.
dcterms:title: Leduc Poker

dcterms:creator: Viliam Lisý
Marc Lanctot
Michael Bowling
dcterms:description: II Goofspiel is a variant of Goofspiel where each player starts with a hand of cards with ranks 0 to N-1. Players bid on revealed cards for points, with the game consisting of N rounds.
dcterms:title: II Goofspiel (6 cards)

dcterms:creator: Viliam Lisý
Marc Lanctot
Michael Bowling
dcterms:description: II Goofspiel is a variant of Goofspiel where each player starts with a hand of cards with ranks 0 to N-1. Players bid on revealed cards for points, with the game consisting of N rounds.
dcterms:title: II Goofspiel (13 cards)

dcterms:creator: Johannes Heinrich
David Silver
dcterms:description: Liar's Dice is a bluffing game played with N six-sided dice for each player. Players keep their dice outcomes private and can either bid or call 'liar!' on the previous bid.
dcterms:title: Liar’s Dice (1 die)

dcterms:creator: Johannes Heinrich
David Silver
dcterms:description: Liar's Dice is a bluffing game played with N six-sided dice for each player. Players keep their dice outcomes private and can either bid or call 'liar!' on the previous bid.
dcterms:title: Liar’s Dice (2 dice)
